mapper.select: SELECT status FROM t_log WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_log_detail(lid, res_url, htmllog) VALUES (#{lid}, #{res_url}, #{log});
INSERT INTO t_log(uid, title, `date`, gid, `type`, status) VALUES (#{uid}, #{title}, #{date}, #{gid}, #{category.cid}, #{status});
INSERT INTO t_reply(lid, uid, guest_name, guest_email, `desc`, `date`) VALUES (#{lid}, #{uid}, #{username}, #{email}, #{desc}, #{date});
mapper.select: SELECT t_log.id, t_log.uid, t_log.type, t_log.gid, t_log.title, t_log.date, t_log.status, count(*) AS count FROM t_log join t_reply ON t_log.id = t_reply.lid AND t_log.gid = 0 GROUP BY t_log.id ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT t_account_category_map.id AS id, t_category.id AS cid, t_category.desc AS `desc`, t_account_category_map.uid AS uid FROM t_category INNER JOIN t_account_category_map ON t_category.id = t_account_category_map.type_id WHERE t_account_category_map.uid = #{uid};
SELECT t_category.id AS cid, t_category.desc FROM t_log JOIN t_category WHERE gid = 0 AND t_category.id = t_log.type GROUP BY t_category.id;
